summary.span: 提供一组标准的与编辑相关的命令。

span.span: Provides a standard set of editing related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了编辑命令和关联的默认键笔势（其中包含来自 和 枚举的键名）。The following table shows the editing commands and the associated default key gestures (with key names from the and enumerations). |编辑命令Editing command|默认键笔势Default key gesture| |---------------------|-------------------------| ||`Ctrl`+`E`| ||`Ctrl`+`J`| ||`Ctrl`+`L`| ||`Ctrl`+`R`| ||`Backspace`| ||无默认键笔势no default key gesture| ||`Ctrl`+`OemOpenBrackets`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`T`| ||`Delete`| ||`Ctrl`+`Delete`| ||`Ctrl`+`Backspace`| ||`Shift`+`Enter`| ||`Enter`| ||无默认键笔势no default key gesture| ||`Ctrl`+`OemCloseBrackets`| ||`Ctrl`+`T`| ||`Down`| ||`PageDown`| ||`Ctrl`+`Down`| ||`Left`| ||`Ctrl`+`Left`| ||`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`End`| ||`Ctrl`+`Home`| ||`End`| ||`Home`| ||`Up`| ||`PageUp`| ||`Ctrl`+`Up`| ||`Shift`+`Down`| ||`Shift`+`PageDown`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Down`| ||`Shift`+`Left`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Left`| ||`Shift`+`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`End`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Home`| ||`Shift`+`End`| ||`Shift`+`Home`| ||`Shift`+`Up`| ||`Shift`+`PageUp`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Up`| ||`Shift`+`Tab`| ||`Tab`| ||`Ctrl`+`B`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`L`| ||`Insert`| ||`Ctrl`+`I`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`N`| ||`Ctrl`+`OemPlus`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift+OemPlus`| ||`Ctrl`+`U`| 脱字号移动命令和选择扩展命令共享一组通用的默认键笔势，一般差别在于添加了 键，以将选择的命令与插入符号移动命令区分开来。Caret movement commands and selection expanding commands share a common set of default key gestures, the general difference being the addition of the key to differentiate selection commands from caret movement commands. 例如， 命令的默认键笔势为 ，相应的 命令的默认键笔势为 +。For example, the command has a default key gesture of , and the corresponding command has a default key gesture of +. 通常， 类提供的命令定义不使用命令参数（ 方法所需的 `parameter` 参数）。In general, the command definitions provided by the class do not make use of command parameters (the `parameter` parameter expected by the method). 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在支持命令的对象上调用编辑命令。The following example demonstrates how to invoke an editing command on an object that supports the command. 在此示例中， 用作命令目标。For this example, a serves as the command target. 请注意， 实现 接口（从 继承），并且它包括对许多编辑命令的本机支持。Note that implements the interface (inherited from ), and that it includes native support for many editing commands. 方法的第一个参数是命令参数。The first argument for the method is a command parameter. 大多数编辑命令忽略 command 参数;通常，应为编辑命令 `null` 此参数。Most editing commands ignore the command parameter; in general, this parameter should be `null` for editing commands. 第二个参数指定要将命令路由到的对象。The second argument specifies the object to which the command will be routed. 此对象必须实现 接口，并应包括指定命令的处理程序。This object must implement the interface, and should include a handler for the specified command. 通常，在不处理命令的对象上调用命令时，将忽略该命令。Generally, a command is ignored when invoked on an object that does not handle the command. [!code-csharp[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_editingcommands_invoke)] [!code-vb[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_editingcommands_invoke)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AlignCenter As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ AlignCenter { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示 命令，该命令请求将当前段落或选中的段落居中。

span.span: Represents the command, which requests that the current paragraph or a selection of paragraphs be centered.
The requested command.

value.span: 此命令的默认键笔势为 +。

span.span: The default key gesture for this command is +.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令在 级别操作。This command operates at the level. 如果对某个段落中的部分内容选择调用此命令（包括一个段落中插入符号的空选定内容），则将请求的效果应用于整个段落。If this command is invoked on a partial selection of content within a paragraph (including an empty selection where the caret is within a paragraph), the requested effect is applied to the entire paragraph. 如果对跨多个段落的选定内容调用此命令，则会将效果应用于参与选定内容的每个段落的全部内容。If this command is invoked on a selection that spans multiple paragraphs, the effect is applied to the entire contents of each paragraph that participates in the selection. 下图显示了一个居中内容的示例。The following figure shows an example of centered content. ![屏幕快照：中心的文本对齐属性值](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "屏幕快照：TextAlign 属性值 Center")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center") 本机支持此命令。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在支持命令的对象上调用编辑命令。The following example demonstrates how to invoke an editing command on an object that supports the command. 在此示例中， 用作命令目标。For this example, a serves as the command target. 请注意， 实现 接口（从 继承），并且它包括对许多编辑命令的本机支持。Note that implements the interface (inherited from ), and that it includes native support for many editing commands. 方法的第一个参数是命令参数。The first argument for the method is a command parameter. 大多数编辑命令忽略 command 参数;通常，应为编辑命令 `null` 此参数。Most editing commands ignore the command parameter; in general, this parameter should be `null` for editing commands. 第二个参数指定要将命令路由到的对象。The second argument specifies the object to which the command will be routed. 此对象必须实现 接口，并应包括指定命令的处理程序。This object must implement the interface, and should include a handler for the specified command. 通常，在不处理命令的对象上调用命令时，将忽略该命令。Generally, a command is ignored when invoked on an object that does not handle the command. [!code-csharp[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_editingcommands_invoke)] [!code-vb[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_editingcommands_invoke)]

public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ AlignJustify { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示 命令，该命令请求将当前段落或选中的段落两端对齐。

span.span: Represents the command, which requests that the current paragraph or a selection of paragraphs be justified.
The requested command.

value.span: 此命令的默认键笔势为 +。

span.span: The default key gesture for this command is +.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令在 级别操作。This command operates at the level. 如果对某个段落中的部分内容选择调用此命令（包括一个段落中插入符号的空选定内容），则将请求的效果应用于整个段落。If this command is invoked on a partial selection of content within a paragraph (including an empty selection where the caret is within a paragraph), the requested effect is applied to the entire paragraph. 如果对跨多个段落的选定内容调用此命令，则会将效果应用于所选内容中的所有段落。If this command is invoked on a selection that spans multiple paragraphs, the effect is applied to all the paragraphs in the selection. 对齐内容时，将调整每个内容行内的水平间距，以使对齐的行的宽度相等或接近相等。When content is justified, the horizontal spacing within each line of content is adjusted so that the justified lines are of equal or near-equal width. 内容通常对齐，以在内容的侧面创建平滑边缘。Content is typically justified to create smooth edges on the sides of the content. 由于它通常比其余部分更短，因此，在调用此命令后，段落中的最后一行可能仍然对齐。Because it is often shorter than the rest, the last line in a paragraph may remain unjustified after this command is invoked. 下图显示了对齐（左对齐）内容。The following figure shows unjustified (left-aligned) content. ![屏幕快照：内容是对齐](~/add/media/content-unjustified.png "屏幕快照：内容未对齐")![Screenshot: Content is unjustified](~/add/media/content-unjustified.png "Screenshot: Content is unjustified") 下图显示了两端的相同内容。The following figure shows the same content after it has been justified. ![内容调整文本的屏幕截图](~/add/media/content-justified.png "内容对齐文本的屏幕快照")![Screenshot of content justified text](~/add/media/content-justified.png "Screenshot of content justified text") 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是响应此命令的实际实现;在许多情况下，响应命令的实现就是应用程序编写者的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 本机支持此命令。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在支持命令的对象上调用编辑命令。The following example demonstrates how to invoke an editing command on an object that supports the command. 在此示例中， 用作命令目标。For this example, a serves as the command target. 请注意， 实现 接口（从 继承），并且它包括对许多编辑命令的本机支持。Note that implements the interface (inherited from ), and that it includes native support for many editing commands. 方法的第一个参数是命令参数。The first argument for the method is a command parameter. 大多数编辑命令忽略 command 参数;通常，应为编辑命令 `null` 此参数。Most editing commands ignore the command parameter; in general, this parameter should be `null` for editing commands. 第二个参数指定要将命令路由到的对象。The second argument specifies the object to which the command will be routed. 此对象必须实现 接口，并应包括指定命令的处理程序。This object must implement the interface, and should include a handler for the specified command. 通常，在不处理命令的对象上调用命令时，将忽略该命令。Generally, a command is ignored when invoked on an object that does not handle the command. [!code-csharp[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_editingcommands_invoke)] [!code-vb[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_editingcommands_invoke)]

The requested command.

value.span: 此命令的默认键笔势为 。

span.span: The default key gesture for this command is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对空选定内容调用时，此命令将删除插入符号前的字符或段落分隔符。When invoked on an empty selection, this command deletes the character or paragraph separator just before the caret. 在非空选择上调用时，此命令将删除选择。When invoked on a non-empty selection, this command deletes the selection. 此命令将保留在调用此命令后立即插入到同一位置的内容的已删除选择内容中的任何格式。This command retains any formatting from the deleted selection for content immediately inserted at the same location after this command is invoked. 与 命令相反，它不会保留以前的格式设置。Contrast with the command, which does not retain previous formatting. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是响应此命令的实际实现;在许多情况下，响应命令的实现就是应用程序编写者的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 、和 本机支持此命令。This command is natively supported by , , and . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在支持命令的对象上调用编辑命令。The following example demonstrates how to invoke an editing command on an object that supports the command. 在此示例中， 用作命令目标。For this example, a serves as the command target. 请注意， 实现 接口（从 继承），并且它包括对许多编辑命令的本机支持。Note that implements the interface (inherited from ), and that it includes native support for many editing commands. 方法的第一个参数是命令参数。The first argument for the method is a command parameter. 大多数编辑命令忽略 command 参数;通常，应为编辑命令 `null` 此参数。Most editing commands ignore the command parameter; in general, this parameter should be `null` for editing commands. 第二个参数指定要将命令路由到的对象。The second argument specifies the object to which the command will be routed. 此对象必须实现 接口，并应包括指定命令的处理程序。This object must implement the interface, and should include a handler for the specified command. 通常，在不处理命令的对象上调用命令时，将忽略该命令。Generally, a command is ignored when invoked on an object that does not handle the command. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对插入点所在的空选定内容调用此命令，则将自动展开所选内容，将该命令应用于整个单词。If this command is invoked on an empty selection where the caret is within a word, the selection is automatically expanded to apply the command to the entire word. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是响应此命令的实际实现;在许多情况下，响应命令的实现就是应用程序编写者的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 本机支持此命令。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在支持命令的对象上调用编辑命令。The following example demonstrates how to invoke an editing command on an object that supports the command. 在此示例中， 用作命令目标。For this example, a serves as the command target. 请注意， 实现 接口（从 继承），并且它包括对许多编辑命令的本机支持。Note that implements the interface (inherited from ), and that it includes native support for many editing commands. 方法的第一个参数是命令参数。The first argument for the method is a command parameter. 大多数编辑命令忽略 command 参数;通常，应为编辑命令 `null` 此参数。Most editing commands ignore the command parameter; in general, this parameter should be `null` for editing commands. 第二个参数指定要将命令路由到的对象。The second argument specifies the object to which the command will be routed. 此对象必须实现 接口，并应包括指定命令的处理程序。This object must implement the interface, and should include a handler for the specified command. 通常，在不处理命令的对象上调用命令时，将忽略该命令。Generally, a command is ignored when invoked on an object that does not handle the command. remarks.format: ## Remarks *文本容器*是构成手头内容最终边框的元素。A *text container* is the element that forms the ultimate border for the content at hand. 和 是文本容器的示例。 and are examples of text containers. 文本容器内包含的内容统称为*文档*。The content collectively contained within a text container is referred to as a *document*. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是响应此命令的实际实现;在许多情况下，响应命令的实现就是应用程序编写者的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 、和 本机支持此命令。This command is natively supported by , , and . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在支持命令的对象上调用编辑命令。The following example demonstrates how to invoke an editing command on an object that supports the command. 在此示例中， 用作命令目标。For this example, a serves as the command target. 请注意， 实现 接口（从 继承），并且它包括对许多编辑命令的本机支持。Note that implements the interface (inherited from ), and that it includes native support for many editing commands. 方法的第一个参数是命令参数。The first argument for the method is a command parameter. 大多数编辑命令忽略 command 参数;通常，应为编辑命令 `null` 此参数。Most editing commands ignore the command parameter; in general, this parameter should be `null` for editing commands. 第二个参数指定要将命令路由到的对象。The second argument specifies the object to which the command will be routed. 此对象必须实现 接口，并应包括指定命令的处理程序。This object must implement the interface, and should include a handler for the specified command. 通常，在不处理命令的对象上调用命令时，将忽略该命令。Generally, a command is ignored when invoked on an object that does not handle the command. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果插入符号位于某个单词中，则此命令会将选定内容扩展到该单词的开头。If the caret is within a word, this command expands the selection to the beginning of that word. 否则，此命令会将选定内容扩展到上一个词的开头。Otherwise, this command expands the selection to the beginning of the previous word. 扩展的选择不包含单词分隔符。The expanded selection does not include the word delimiter. 与 相反，它在展开的选定内容中包含单词分隔符。Contrast with , which does include the word delimiter in the expanded selection. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是响应此命令的实际实现;在许多情况下，响应命令的实现就是应用程序编写者的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 、和 本机支持此命令。This command is natively supported by , , and . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在支持命令的对象上调用编辑命令。The following example demonstrates how to invoke an editing command on an object that supports the command. 在此示例中， 用作命令目标。For this example, a serves as the command target. 请注意， 实现 接口（从 继承），并且它包括对许多编辑命令的本机支持。Note that implements the interface (inherited from ), and that it includes native support for many editing commands. 方法的第一个参数是命令参数。The first argument for the method is a command parameter. 大多数编辑命令忽略 command 参数;通常，应为编辑命令 `null` 此参数。Most editing commands ignore the command parameter; in general, this parameter should be `null` for editing commands. 第二个参数指定要将命令路由到的对象。The second argument specifies the object to which the command will be routed. 此对象必须实现 接口，并应包括指定命令的处理程序。This object must implement the interface, and should include a handler for the specified command. 通常，在不处理命令的对象上调用命令时，将忽略该命令。Generally, a command is ignored when invoked on an object that does not handle the command. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令在 级别操作。This command operates at the level. 如果对某个段落中的部分内容选择调用此命令（包括一个段落中插入符号的空选定内容），则将请求的效果应用于整个段落。If this command is invoked on a partial selection of content within a paragraph (including an empty selection where the caret is within a paragraph), the requested effect is applied to the entire paragraph. 如果对跨多个段落的选定内容调用此命令，则会将效果应用于参与选定内容的每个段落的全部内容。If this command is invoked on a selection that spans multiple paragraphs, the effect is applied to the entire contents of each paragraph that participates in the selection. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是响应此命令的实际实现;在许多情况下，响应命令的实现就是应用程序编写者的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 本机支持此命令。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在支持命令的对象上调用编辑命令。The following example demonstrates how to invoke an editing command on an object that supports the command. 在此示例中， 用作命令目标。For this example, a serves as the command target. 请注意， 实现 接口（从 继承），并且它包括对许多编辑命令的本机支持。Note that implements the interface (inherited from ), and that it includes native support for many editing commands. 方法的第一个参数是命令参数。The first argument for the method is a command parameter. 大多数编辑命令忽略 command 参数;通常，应为编辑命令 `null` 此参数。Most editing commands ignore the command parameter; in general, this parameter should be `null` for editing commands. 第二个参数指定要将命令路由到的对象。The second argument specifies the object to which the command will be routed. 此对象必须实现 接口，并应包括指定命令的处理程序。This object must implement the interface, and should include a handler for the specified command. 通常，在不处理命令的对象上调用命令时，将忽略该命令。Generally, a command is ignored when invoked on an object that does not handle the command. [!code-csharp[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_editingcommands_invoke)] [!code-vb[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_editingcommands_invoke)]
